text.div:
BC BreastSiteVS ValueSet

Topography of the breast. Codes are drawn from SNOMED CT and can be regarded as equivalent to ICD-O-3 topography codes.

name: BreastSiteVS
title: BC BreastSiteVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Topography of the breast. Codes are drawn from SNOMED CT and can be regarded as equivalent to ICD-O-3 topography codes.

concept.display: Structure of central portion of breast (body structure)
Structure of upper inner quadrant of breast (body structure)
Structure of lower inner quadrant of breast (body structure)
Structure of upper outer quadrant of breast (body structure)
Structure of lower outer quadrant of breast (body structure)
Structure of axillary tail of breast (body structure)
